product.title: Ecowood Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
product.description: In a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, and the wide slats are strong and easy to use. Settle the pistachio shell fine grain against a deep plum purple for a strong and moody bedroom look. Hang the blind on a purple feature wall, painting the others cream or the palest of biscuits, and match bedding and accessories to the plum shade.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home. It's a rich, earthy tone that provides a natural element and will easily pair with grey neutrals or olive hues for a coordinated look. A vertical blind is the full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh and fruity, this valencia spring green roller blind will give your home a bright burst of colour. Combine this blind with more earthy tones to give your room a bold and funky accent or use it to create a vibrant and vivid interior with other striking colours.

relproducts.title: Valencia Tea Green Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Pastel shades are so delicate they an make even the smallest room seem light and airy and this valencia tea green roller blind is certainly no exception. The pale and pristine colouring would be a welcome companion in any room decorated with other light green tones, adding a ge pastel shades are so delicate they an make even the smallest room seem light and airy and this valencia tea green roller blind is certainly no exception.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Olive Green
relproducts.description: Stirloolive green plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Vine Green
relproducts.description: Stirlo vine green plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Valencia Tea Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Pastel shades are incredibly on trend right now and this valencia tea green vertical blind is no exception. Ideal for larger windows and doors, it gives you a chance to bring a wash of gentle colour to your home while allowing you to control the light as well as achieve excellent pastel shades are incredibly on trend right now and this valencia tea green vertical blind is no exception.

relproducts.title: Valencia Pistachio Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This coloured roller blind is striking and very pretty, it will blast serenity into any room. The valencia pistachio roller blind will look at home in a host of rooms. Clearly the calm will work well in a bathroom or a kitchen, equally it will soften a childs bedroom or mayb this coloured roller blind is striking and very pretty, it will blast serenity into any room.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created. We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look. For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A soft and wintery shade, as its name suggests, the ecowood in blizzard grey satin is nothing if not cool, calm, and collected. Its subtle and unassuming tone means it's completely versatile and will work anywhere in the home amidst any dcor scheme. Try the blizzard grey satin in an all-white dining room, using this soft grey as the only colour in the form of furniture, accessories, and of course, the blind.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look. For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind offers everything a window could need - and more. Use the pistachio shell satin to tone down a brightly coloured wall in a living room or bedroom. This creamy tone will match rich shades such as chocolate browns, plum purples, and burgundy reds.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and speed. Matching fixtures are displayed alongside them, including designer ladder ribbons for ultimate style. Build a colourful and vibrant atmosphere in the hallway, placing the pistachio shell fine grain amidst a bold coral feature wall and white walls to compliment.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look. Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.
